---
id: get-tmdb-providers
title: "Get streaming providers"

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/tmdb/providers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetch list of streaming service providers available for the configured region. Results are cached for 24 hours.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
